title: Shorten timeout for failure to launch worker node
body:
### Steps to reproduce

Some kind of problem launching worker nodes (like #3142, for example). MSBuild's behavior is to just hang for a 300-second timeout connecting to the (nonexistent) worker node.

### Expected  behavior

A reasonably quick error message.

### Actual behavior

Just hangs for a 300-second timeout connecting to the (nonexistent) worker node.
